trans:
Where would that first love, that girl, meet someone like me every single day?
The years gone by,
Sad streets sound like sad ship horns,
Listen!
Now that I,
At this age,
I don't have any regrets about youth,
For some reason, there is an empty place in my heart!
You, from that time, who will never return! Oh, romantic lover!
- So, This â€œOn Romanceâ€
There was a melody from an existing song, and on such a "rainy day," there was a "tango"-like melody. A singer known for such songs, Ra Hoon-ah, existed, and this "tango" melody was sung and shared. It became a song known to the people of the Republic of Korea ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡· or the Korean Empire ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡·. This song was shared among the people, becoming part of their lives .Thus, to the workers who could understand it, it was hoped that they would reflect carefully, avoid becoming victims, and move in the opposite direction of victimhood.
